name: SleepyPiano
0:
”Alexa, open Sleepy Piano”
”Alexa, start Sleepy Piano”
”Alexa, ask Sleepy Piano to play”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleepy piano
des:
Listen to Sleepy Piano. Just relax or fall asleep to randomly generated piano music. Mathematics in action. 

To start, just say "Alexa, start Sleepy Piano". At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop".

Listen to Sleepy Piano by adding to a Daily Routine. To add this skill to a daily timer, follow these steps:

On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
Click + to add a new routine.
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
Choose "Your Skills" > Select Sleepy Piano
Choose Device to perform the routine > SAVE.

If you enjoyed this skill, please leave a review.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
